articles.author: Meg Wagner, Amanda Wills and Brian Ries, CNN
articles.title: Paul Manafort and Rick Gates surrender to FBI: Live updates
articles.description: Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort is turning himself in today to special counsel Robert Mueller, according to a source with direct knowledge. Follow here for live updates.

articles.author: Jeremy Herb, Evan Perez, Marshall Cohen, Pamela Brown and Shimon Prokupecz, CNN
articles.title: Ex-Trump campaign adviser pleads guilty to making false statement
articles.description: A former Trump campaign foreign policy adviser has pleaded guilty to making a false statement to the FBI after he lied about his interactions with foreign officials close to the Russian government -- the campaign's clearest connection so far to Russia's efforts to meddle in the 2016 election.

articles.author: Jill Disis
articles.title: How the feds say Paul Manafort spent his millions
articles.description: Paul Manafort allegedly spent $18 million in illicit overseas wealth on a lavish lifestyle in the United States, according to a newly released federal indictment.

articles.title: The Mueller investigation: who could be next? - CNN Video
articles.description: Special counsel Robert Mueller's investigation into Russia's involvement in the 2016 election has yielded two indictments and a guilty plea. Who could be next?

articles.author: Paul Callan
articles.title: Manafort charges will send shivers through the White House
articles.description: Paul Callan: As the first indictments in Robert Mueller's investigation are unsealed, hints regarding the road ahead are beginning to emerge.

articles.title: Manafort attorney: No Russia collusion - CNN Video
articles.description: Paul Manafort's attorney Kevin Downing says the charges against his client are related to his work to promote US relations with Ukraine, saying the work ended in 2014 and was not related to the 2016 US presidential election.

articles.author: Tom Kludt
articles.title: How Fox News is covering the toughest day of the Trump presidency
articles.description: The indictments against former Trump campaign officials have forced Fox News to confront a familiar tension between its ideological allegiance and editorial responsibility.

articles.author: Tal Kopan and Kara Scannell, CNN
articles.title: Tony Podesta steps aside from lobbying firm
articles.description: Tony Podesta, a major Democratic Washington player, is stepping aside from his lobbying firm amid the special counsel's investigation, he began telling people Monday.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Papadopoulos' guilty plea is much bigger problem for Trump than the Manafort indictment
articles.description: Even as President Trump was on Twitter insisting that the indictment of former campaign chairman Paul Manafort was meaningless because it involved activities unrelated to Trump or the campaign came news that former Trump foreign policy adviser George Papadopoulos had pled guilty to lying to the FBI about his contacts with, wait for it, Russia.

articles.author: Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: What the Manafort indictment proves about Trump (and what it doesn't)
articles.description: On Monday morning, former Trump presidential campaign chairman Paul Manafort was indicted on charges of money laundering and filing false foreign lobbying reports, among other counts.
